EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate Invitation (EN)
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now! Tricentis Accelerate in Vienna - 22. October 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Accelerate 2015
October 22nd, 2015
9:00 - 22:00 CEST
Vienna, Austria
Register now, free of charge!
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Registration for Tricentis Accelerate 2015 is now open! Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops and networking in Vienna, Austria.
This year, our conference will be highlighting the following topics:
路 Test Automation
路 Service Virtualization
路 Mobile Testing
路 Agile & DevOps
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Accelerate Team
